title: security operators
extract: An information security operations center ("ISOC" or "SOC") is a facility where enterprise information systems (web sites, applications, databases, data centers and servers, networks, desktops and other endpoints) are monitored, assessed, and defended.
extract_html: An information security operations center ("ISOC" or "SOC") is a facility where enterprise information systems (web sites, applications, databases, data centers and servers, networks, desktops and other endpoints) are monitored, assessed, and defended.
